about.title: About Us
about.subtitle: Learn about the creator and the story behind Recipe Cost Calculator
about.intro: I'm a software engineer who loves building useful tools. I created Recipe Cost Calculator as a fun side project to solve a real problem I encountered while cooking and meal planning.
about.whyContent1: As someone who enjoys cooking, I found myself constantly trying to figure out how much recipes actually cost. Calculating partial costs from packages was tedious with pen and paper, and I couldn't find a simple tool that handled unit conversions automatically.
about.whyContent2: So I built this! It's designed to be faster and easier than manual calculations, with automatic conversions between cups, ounces, grams, and more.
about.hopeContent: Whether you're a home cook trying to budget, a food blogger calculating recipe costs, or a small business pricing your products, I hope this tool makes your life a little easier. If you have feedback or ideas, I'd love to hear from you!

contact.responseTime: I'll do my best to respond within a few days.
